CustomField.description: For core SFDC list views this contains the column data created by the SFDC platform when a list view is created. For manual list views the column data is supplied by the list view creator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For core SFDC list views this contains the column data created by the SFDC platform when a list view is created. For manual list views the column data is supplied by the list view creator.
CustomField.label: ListView Columns
